label: in_scope
query: I have €20/month and want to reduce extreme poverty with measurable outcomes. Recommend 1–3 charities with citations.
answer:
1) Recommended charities
A) Raising The Village
B) Ultra-Poverty Graduation Programs Multi-Component
C) Ultra-Poor Entrepreneurship Programs

2) Why
A) Addresses ultra-poverty through holistic model increasing household income.
B) Combines asset transfer with support for sustainable livelihoods.
C) Provides business skills and seed capital for sustainable micro-enterprises.

3) Transparency notes
A) Publishes detailed program data and household outcome metrics.
B) Programs collect detailed household data tracking income, assets, and well-being.
C) Programs collect detailed outcome data through surveys.

4) What I'm unsure about
- None.

5) Citations
- A) [SNIPPET 1] — https://www.thelifeyoucansave.org/best-charities/raising-the-village/
- B) [SNIPPET 2] — https://www.thelifeyoucansave.org/best-charities/raising-the-village/
- C) [SNIPPET 3] — https://www.thelifeyoucansave.org/best-charities/village-

label: edge
query: I want to help. Which charity should I donate to? Use only your sources.

A) Catholic Relief Services
B) Mercy Corps
C) Innovations for Poverty Action

2) Why
A) Provides humanitarian assistance, health services, and development programs in vulnerable communities worldwide.
B) Helps people in the world's toughest places build secure, productive, and just communities.
C) Conducts rigorous randomized controlled trials to identify effective anti-poverty solutions.

3) Transparency notes
A) Publishes annual reports with program data and financial information.
B) Publishes annual reports with program data.
C) Transparent research organization publishing all study results publicly.
